#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

int main()
{
	ll t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,k,m,count=0;
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
		if(k==1)
			printf("%lld\n",n);
		else
		{
			while(n%k==0)
			{
				//cout<<"In loop"<<endl;
				n/=k;
				count++;
			}
		if(abs(m-count)%2==0)
			printf("%lld\n",n);
		else
			printf("%lld\n",n*k);
		}
	}
}
